snippet: Recognizing the urgent need to stop the country’s nuclear weapons program, South Korea, Japan and China issued a joint statement in which they said they would continue to try to reopen talks aimed at ending North Korea’s nuclear weapons...
lead_paragraph: Recognizing the urgent need to stop the country’s nuclear weapons program, South Korea, Japan and China issued a joint statement in which they said they would continue to try to reopen talks aimed at ending North Korea’s nuclear weapons development.

headline.main: Chinese, Japanese and South Korean Ministers to Resume Three-Way Talks
headline.print_headline: Trilateral Meeting Focuses On North Korean Threat
